data.title: Slush 2024
data.meta_description: Slush 2024 coming on Nov 20–21 in Helsinki, Finland. Tickets available now.
data.meta_site_name: Slush 2024 | The World's Leading Startup Event
data.text:
At Slush, we help founders change the world, and one way to do so is by sharing wisdom through mentoring. By orchestrating highly curated mentoring sessions run by our speakers throughout both event days, we are able to give back to the ecosystem by offering more intimate personalized advice and insights to our early-stage founders.

Do you want to have your own booth at the heart of the Slush venue?

It’s the most concrete way to get traction, leads, and general visibility for early-stage startups and their products.

Contact [email protected] for questions.

Slush 100—the most coveted startup competition in the world.

At Slush 2023, world-class funds Accel, General Catalyst, Lightspeed Venture Partners, NEA, and Northzone came together to invest €1,000,000 in the best early-stage startup at Slush.

Stay tuned for information about the 2024 edition.

When was the last time you dipped in the icy sea or slid through the Finnish archipelago? Maybe you’re looking for an activity to network with founder peers? We’ve got experiences for the adrenaline junkies and those that want to relax before kickstarting their time at Slush.

Stay tuned for information about Founder Experiences in 2024.

If you’re looking for media coverage, this is for you.

The Slush Media Bank is a curated resource bank and a platform for you to launch your news during Slush Week, making sure journalists don’t miss a thing.

Submit your newsworthy announcements on the Slush Platform for a chance to be featured on the Media Bank. Submissions open in October.

Elevator pitching—literally.

A pre-Slush event for early-stage founders for a chance to practice “elevator pitching” and receive feedback from top VCs.

The best of it? We’re organizing this in actual elevators together with Finland’s iconic elevator company, KONE.

No founders, no media.

Just you and 2,000+ fellow investors under the same roof one day before the Slush main event.

Get a headstart on your Slush experience through Investor Day with a program created to maximize your networking and learning opportunities. Participate in spontaneous networking, book 1-1 meetings, engage in roundtable discussions, and listen to 7 high-quality stage talks.

Investor Day registration now open on the Slush Platform for Investor Pass holders.

Cable Factory, 1 PM-6 PM, Nov 19, 2024.

Do you want to know who the next generation of top-tier managers are?

Slush x RAISE, Europe’s leading emerging manager event, is a pitch competition for the continent’s best GPs that haven’t raised their fund III. The Slush x RAISE selection committee consisting of The Packard Foundation, Northwestern University, Oxford University, The Dietrich Foundation, Point72 Private Investments, LGT, Top Tier, and more chooses 20 managers to pitch at Slush in front of 150+ LPs.

Applications open now on the Slush Platform.

Imagine you’d have a 75-minute private session with access to hand-picked startup invitees according to your interests in one go.

And better yet, what if this session had the flexibility to offer a customized program, ranging from stage presentations to workshops? How about catering options that help you tailor your session for the most effective use of time?

Dream no more. Welcome to Investor Office Hours.

Please reach out to [email protected] to secure an IOH session for this year.

Regardless of whether you like sweating it out or absorbing a local cultural experience, we’ve got something for everyone to kick off their Slush Week.

Sauna and Ice Dipping at Allas Sea Pool: Nov 19, 9.30 AM–11.30 AM

Padel and Golf at Social Sports Club: Nov 19, 10 AM–1 PM

Yoga at Sagayoga: Nov 19, 10.30 AM–12.15 PM

Art Tour at Kiasma: Nov 19, 11 AM–1 PM

Registration for Investor Experience Events opens later in the fall.

If you’re looking for media coverage, this is for you.

The Slush Media Bank is a curated resource bank and a platform for you to launch your news during Slush Week, making sure journalists don’t miss a thing.

Submit your newsworthy announcements on the Slush Platform for a chance to be featured on the Media Bank. Submissions open in October.

20,000+ meetings take place at Slush over 2 days. Matchmaking is at the core of Slush, and we’re here to make meeting your next unicorn, LP, or investor peers a walk in the park.

Browse the other 13,000 attendees at Slush, schedule meetings, chat with attendees, and make magic happen with our custom in-house-built Matchmaking Tool.

This is where Media Pass holders will write their next story, interview future shapers, network with peers, and relax during the event

At the Media Area, you will have access to pre-bookable interview and podcast pods, and working tables.

Plus, if you need help during the event, we’ve got you covered. A help desk will be available during the whole event.

Media Bank is the resource bank for finding your next story.

Located inside the Slush Platform, it gathers all announcements happening during Slush Week so none are lost in the noise.

Media Bank will be opened in the fall.

Looking to do an interview or record a podcast at Slush? The Media Area’s pre-bookable, quiet pods are here for you. These pods can comfortably fit 2–4 people. Bookings for Slush 2024 will open later.

Slush Media Morning is an exclusive event for media on the morning of Nov 20 (Day 1) at the Media Area at the Slush Venue. Kick off your Slush experience with breakfast, network with your peers, and get ready for the event days ahead.

Stay tuned—registration opens soon.

Slush is the largest gathering of venture capital in the world, bringing together $3 trillion in assets under management under one roof.

We’re thus welcoming a wide slate of both established and emerging managers.

Meet them at Slush either through our Matchmaking Tool or at one of our curated Side Events.

Our LP team will be at your disposal to help you navigate the event, set up meetings with relevant managers, and curate bespoke GP lists according to your investment criteria.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to us by emailing our LP Relations at [email protected]

Access the 13,000 bright minds of tech and VC through our in-house Matchmaking Tool. Whether you’re joining Slush to meet peers, lock leads, or find collaborators, everyone’s here. During Slush, over 20,000 meetings take place under one roof amongst the most relevant crowd in startups and tech on the planet.

Our stages are carefully curated to showcase the best and brightest in startups and tech, and for good reason: they’re at Slush to share their knowledge to help you level up your business. In addition to having them on stage, we offer curated mentoring sessions with these industry experts.

This year, we’re introducing a mentoring concept, Speaker Deep-dives, which is accessible to all ticket types, including Attendee and Thursday Pass holders.

Slush is not just a 2-day event in Messukeskus. It’s a movement that floods Helsinki for one whole week with curated events ranging from niche to general, official to party. Make your visit count by exploring what our partners and community collaborators have to offer.

Close to 50% of the people you see at Slush are founders and 25% are investors.

Slush is a visibility opportunity like no other.

We offer unmatched visibility through our fully customizable Partner Booths, which you can get in contact with us about at [email protected].

Designed to help our partners laser-focus on relevancy, Partner Pods offer our partners a unique space to host exclusive events such as meetings, lunches, mentoring, and pitching sessions.

Located inside Slush Main Venue, each Pod is tailored to create the perfect space for more intimate and exclusive gatherings. Sessions in the pods will be listed online to attract attendees, and our trained volunteers will assist in setting up the space to ensure everything runs smoothly.

To discover more about how you can leverage this unique opportunity, please contact us at [email protected].

How can you meet anywhere between 50 to 350 of the most relevant people to you at Slush? It’s simple: organize a Partner Side Event.

Side Events are the second most popular activity among all of our visitors, directly after 1-on-1 meetings.

Our packages include a fully furnished and equipped venue next door to the Slush Main Event, invitations to the most relevant Slush visitors, and our Slush Side Event tool for all your admin needs.

If you’re curious to learn world-class finance skills in a hands-on environment, look no further. Our Finance volunteers help us with crucial day-to-day finance operations, and run the coolest clothing store in Finland — the Slush Store which sells merchandise at the event.

At Slush, together the Marketing and Design teams form the Studio Team. We work closely together to create and curate the external communications and visual identity for Slush, online and off.

Studio volunteers film, photograph, graphic design, write, and publish content to Slush’s social media channels during and after the event with the support of the full-time team. Additionally, we ensure Slush’s stage content is livestreamed to our online audience, and we engage with the Slush community in our DM’s, comment sections, and feeds.

The Media & PR team has two core responsibilities at Slush: attracting the world’s leading media representatives to Slush and creating the best media experience of any event on the planet for them, and building compelling narratives to showcase Slush as an organization to media. Media & PR volunteers make sure all guests in these concepts have a stellar customer experience.

Slush would not happen without our people — the 1,500 volunteers make the real magic happen. The People Team recruits and trains these curious future builders. On top of this, we organize training events and gatherings for the Slush team and volunteers and make sure the volunteer operations run smoothly from start to finish.

The Partnership Team brings the world’s leading companies, scale-ups, country delegations, and research labs to be involved in Slush activities as partners. Our Partners generate a significant part of income for Slush while bringing relevant and value-adding activities for the founder and investor audiences of the event. Partnerships volunteers make sure all partners have a stellar experience with Slush in each encounter.

The Program team is at the center of one of Slush’s most visible parts of the event: Speakers and stages. We bring the most iconic founders, investors, operators, and tech executives on stage in order to encourage the next generation of people to build companies. Our content focuses on practical company-building advice – everything that an aspiring or an early-stage founder needs to know in order to build a groundbreaking venture. Program team volunteers work closely with our iconic speakers and ensure they have a smooth and superb experience at Slush.

The Investor team is responsible for attracting the world’s leading venture capital investors to Slush, and creating the best investor experience of any event on the planet for them. Investor team volunteers work on the concepts and events offered to the investors visiting Slush and make sure they get excellent customer service in every encounter with Slush. The Investor Team volunteers will have a chance to interact with investors having $3 trillion in assets under management.

The Startup Team has the exciting responsibility of taking care of our largest core visitor group — the startup CEOs and founders. This is done with concepts like Founders Day, Founder’s Day Experiences and Startup Booths to mention a few. Startup Team is also responsible for the Meeting Area and the overall Meeting Experience that are at the core of Slush. People come to Slush to meet relevant people for their ventures – and we’ve taken it to our heart to execute it to perfection for them. Startup team volunteers make sure all founders are treated like royalty in every encounter they have with Slush.
